SummaryEnglish: One day, Tsubasa Hanekawa encounters a giant white tiger apparition at an intersection that talks to her. Her house burns down the next day, leaving her homeless.

1.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of 5. The morning of August 21st. Tsubasa comes across an oddity in the shape of a big white tiger on the first day of the 2nd term. She talks to Hitagi about it, because Koyomi is absent. To make matters worse, her house is on fire in the afternoon of the same day.

2.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of 5. August 22nd. Tsubasa and Hitagi take a day off, and spend time at Hitagi's house to relax. The night of August 22nd. Tsubasa unknowingly turns into Black Hanekawa, and goes to meet the Tiger.

3.SummaryEnglish: Part 3 of 5. August 23rd. Tsubasa goes to school. Hitagi takes a day off again. Tsubasa learns that Suruga got an email from Koyomi last night. Then, Tsubasa unexpectedly stays at Koyomi's house from that night, because Hitagi asks Karen for help. At midnight, Black Hanekawa meets Shinobu again in Koyomi's room.

4.SummaryEnglish: Part 4 of 5. The morning of August 24th. Not only Koyomi but also Suruga disappeared. Tsubasa realizes that she unknowingly turns into Black Hanekawa every night. Then, she comes across a vampire hunter Episode and a mysterious woman Izuko Gaen on the way to school. Izuko tells her that Tsubasa is going to name the Tiger as Kako. Meanwhile, Hitagi thinks that the fire follows Tsubasa.

5.SummaryEnglish: Part 5 of 5. The night of August 24th. Tsubasa decides to accept herself including Black Hanekawa and Kako even if she becomes a worst version of herself, and then, she writes a long letter to Black Hanekawa. Meanwhile, Kako plans to burn Hitagi's house.

6.SummaryEnglish: This one is the clip show part 1: "Koyomi Vamp" in "Kizumonogatari" and "Tsubasa Family" in "Nekomonogatari(kuro)".

7.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of 4. August 20th. It's the last day of the summer vacation. Koyomi met Yotsugi Ononogi again when he was looking for Mayoi to give her big backpack she forgot at his house. After he got home, Shinobu points out that Koyomi hasn't do his homework yet. He wants her to go back to yesterday with her power.

8.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of 4. Koyomi and Shinobu arrived at the same place, but the date was May 13th, 11 years ago. After a bit while, Koyomi thinks of the idea that he tries to change Mayoi's fate.

9.SummaryEnglish: Part 3 of 4. Koyomi and Shinobu get back August 21st together, however, they find that the human race is about to perish. They try thinking about why it had become this situation. The last newspaper's issue day they found is June 14th. Shinobu has something in her mind.

10.SummaryEnglish: Part 4 of 4. The night of August 26th. After doing fireworks at the park, Koyomi and Shinobu are surrounded by a lot of zombies. Suddenly, a woman with a big backpack emerges out of nowhere to save them with white rice. Koyomi tells her his name, and then she gives him a letter from Meme Oshino.

11.SummaryEnglish: This one is the clip show part 2: "Hitagi Crab", "Mayoi Maimai", "Suruga Monkey", "Nadeko Snake" in "Bakemonogatari".

12.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of 4. Nadeko's classmates have been in confusion about their relationship yet due to the incantation that was spread by Deishû Kaiki. On the morning of October 31st, Nadeko is spoken by a strange high school girl who calls herself Ougi Oshino. After that, she often see a white snake in a vision.

13.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of 4. The night of October 31th. The vision of a white snake, Kuchinawa, asks Nadeko to look for sacred its body that should be enshrined in Kita-shirahebi shrine. Kuchinawa changes its body into a white scrunchie to stay with her at any time.

14.SummaryEnglish: Part 3 of 4. Nadeko stayed at Koyomi's house last night, and she gets up with his sister, and also her friend Tsukihi in the same bed on the morning of November 2nd. After a little while, Tsukihi criticizes Nadeko for hiding her true feeling.

15.SummaryEnglish: Part 4 of 4. November 2nd. Nadeko has just found the sacred Kuchinawa's body in front of Koyomi and Shinobu. She eats it abruptly without listening to them, and then, she turns into a poisonous snake-like goddess.

16.SummaryEnglish: This one is the clip show part 3: "Tsubasa Cat" in "Bakemonogatari", and "Karen Bee", "Tsukihi Phoenix" in "Nisemonogatari".

17.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of 4. Koyomi and Shinobu get back to August 21th from parallel universe. When Koyomi returns her backpack to Mayoi, the Darkness suddenly appears and tries to swallow them. They fly away with the help of Yotsugi Ononogi.

18.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of 4. Koyomi and three little girls hide themselves in the abandoned cram school building for the time being. Shinobu tells him that she has experienced the same problem in Japan about 400 years ago.

19.SummaryEnglish: Part 3 of 4. The Darkness appears again in the cram school building, and they fly away somewhere again. August 22th. Koyomi gets up among the mountains after the date has changed. Koyomi, Mayoi and Yotsugi are safe, but he notices that Shinobu hasn't emerged from his shadow. Yotsugi finds the link between the vampires was broken by the Darkness.

20.SummaryEnglish: Part 4 of 4. The early morning of August 22th. Izuko Gaen has been waiting in a house where gang drop in. She tells them she knows everything, and makes Koyomi an offer that she gives every piece of information about the Darkness, so he accepts her three requests instead.

21.SummaryEnglish: Part 1 of 6. January 1st. Hitagi calls her enemy Kaiki because she has no choice to save Koyomi. She asks him to deceive snake-like goddess Nadeko into giving up her plan.

22.SummaryEnglish: Part 2 of 6. The night of January 1st, Kaiki comes to Naoetsu-city again. January 2nd, he begins investigating Nadeko, but he notices that even her parents didn't know her true character. He takes the courage to visit Kita-shirahebi shrine.

23.SummaryEnglish: Part 3 of 6. The night of January 2nd. Kaiki meets Hitagi, and tells her that he met Nadeko, and he thought it's easy for him to deceive her. January 3rd, Yotsugi visits Kaiki to give a message from Izuko Gaen. Izuko has had a specific plan for the shrine.

24.SummaryEnglish: Part 4 of 6. The night of January 3rd. Kaiki receives a threatening letter after he sneaked into Nadeko's house. He and Hitagi exchange some pieces of information on the phone.

25.SummaryEnglish: Part 5 of 6. The night of January 4th. Tsubasa secretly came back Japan. She exactly tells Kaiki what happened in Naoetsu-city since last summer until now, so he understands the details. And then, she asks him whether Meme has a niece or not.

26.SummaryEnglish: Part 6 of 6. February 1st. Kaiki failed his mission because Nadeko has never trusted anyone. When she tells him that she wants to kill Suruga, he takes a desperate gamble.
